abstract: Nascar appeals panel upholds penalty against Richard Childress Racing for manipulating tires on Ryan Newman's car.
lead_paragraph: A Nascar appeals panel has upheld a penalty against Richard Childress Racing for intentionally manipulating the tires on a car driven by Ryan Newman.

headline.main: Penalty Against Richard Childress Racing for Tire Manipulation Is Upheld

snippet: A Nascar appeals panel has upheld a penalty against Richard Childress Racing for intentionally manipulating the tires on a car driven by Ryan Newman.

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
